divs: Sighting DetailsI have seen this object before when i was a child, about 20 miles west of here. Black equilateral triangle with white lights at each point and one red light in middle. Both of my sightings of this object were after 3 am.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Waco
There were no other sightings in Waco on or around August 12th 2012
